mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, electricity_cabinet_name, cell_no, msg, type, status, operate_uid, create_time, update_time from electricity.t_ele_warn_msg where id = #{id}
select id, electricity_cabinet_id, electricity_cabinet_name, cell_no, msg, type, status, operate_uid, create_time, update_time from electricity.t_ele_warn_msg limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into electricity.t_ele_warn_msg(electricity_cabinet_id, electricity_cabinet_name, cell_no, msg, type, status, operate_uid, create_time, update_time) values (#{electricityCabinetId}, #{electricityCabinetName}, #{cellNo}, #{msg}, #{type}, #{status}, #{operateUid}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_ele_warn_msg
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
electricity_cabinet_name = #{electricityCabinetName},
cell_no = #{cellNo},
msg = #{msg},
type = #{type},
status = #{status},
operate_uid = #{operateUid},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
